meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ahistorical.
meanings.sent1: The ahistoricities of the ancient artifact puzzled the historians.
meanings.sent2: Studying the ahistoricities of different cultures helps us understand their present beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The ahistoricities of the time-traveling movie character led to many plot holes.
meanings.sent4: Her ahistoricities were like a blank canvas waiting to be painted with historical knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The ahistoricities of the old building whispered stories of the past.

meanings.definition: Instances or occurrences of lacking historical perspective or context.
meanings.sent1: The book highlighted various ahistoricities in the accounts of the war.
meanings.sent2: The ahistoricities in the museum display confused the visitors.
meanings.sent3: His ahistoricities in understanding the timeline made for a hilarious conversation.
meanings.sent4: The ahistoricities in her arguments left gaps in the historical narrative.
meanings.sent5: The ahistoricities of the conspiracy theory were evident to those well-versed in history.
